lead_paragraph: EASTERN VIRGINIA.--Nowhere has the farming interest advanced with more rapidity than it has of late year in the Tide-water District of Virginia. It was stated by a gentleman from Lancaster county, the other day, that there was annually more than double the quantity of wheat now sown in his district than was reaped twenty years ago.
